title: MrDocs
description: MrDocs is a C++ documentation generator for your projects.

page.title: MrDocs
page.description: MrDocs is a C++ documentation generator for your projects.

banner.description: No workarounds: A tool that fully understands C++
banner.subheader: MrDocs understands C++ so you can focus on keeping the code simple.

features.title: Single Source of Truth
features.description: Mr. Docs takes a specially formatted comment, called a Javadoc, which precedes a C++ declaration and renders it to form a reference as part of documentation.

features.title: It understands C++
features.description: Mr. Docs understands C++: Overload sets, private APIs, Concepts and constraints, unspecified return types, aliases, constants, SFINAE, hidden base classes, niebloids, and coroutines.

features.title: Multiple output formats
features.description: Choose from multiple output formats: Asciidoc, HTML, or XML.

features.title: Customizable
features.description: Mr. Docs is highly customizable. You can change the output format, the theme, and even the way the documentation is generated.

panels.description: MrDocs understands C++ features such as attributes and noexcept functions.
Specially formatted comments are rendered to form a reference as part of documentation.
Special directives are used to describe details about the symbols.
It understands concepts, constraints and SFINAE.
